# Missing Data Overview

```{r}
data <- read_dta("../data/raw/ZA7575.dta")

colSums(is.na(data)) %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  rownames_to_column(var = "attribute") %>% 
  rename("na_count" = 2) %>% 
  arrange(desc(na_count))
```
